card.name: Kang (The Conqueror)
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack. Toughness When Defeated: Advance the main scheme to stage 2 at the end of the phase.

card.name: Kang (Immortus)
card.property: Toughness. This villain cannot take damage while a minion is in play. When Defeated: Remove the Chronopolis from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (Iron Lad)
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove Inexorable Fate from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (Rama-Tut)
card.property: This villain gets +1 ATK for each obligation in play. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove the Realm of Rama-Tut from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (Scarlet Centurion)
card.property: This villain's attack gains piercing. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove The Present Future War from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (The Conqueror)
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack. Toughness. When Defeated: The players win the game.

card.name: Kang's Arrival
card.property: Contents: Kang (I), each Kang (II), and Kang (III). Kang and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Temporal). Setup: Set each Kang (II), Kang (III), and Kang's Dominion side scheme aside. remove each player's obligation cards from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck.

alternate.name: Kang's Arrival
alternate.property: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Kang believes that by defeating Earth's mightiest heroes, the rest of the planet will submit to his rule.

card.name: The Master of Time
card.property: When Revealed: Place 1 acceleration token here for each side scheme in play, then discard each side scheme. Each player reveals a random stage 3A in turn oder. Remove any unused stage 3 schemes from the game.
Kang reels back, but saves himself by separating the heroes through time and space.

alternate.name: The Master of Time
alternate.property: Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead. Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advanced to stage 4A.

card.name: The Chronopolis
card.property: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Immortus) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

alternate.name: The Chronopolis
alternate.property: Forced Response: After this stage is complete, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is complete.

card.name: Inexorable Fate
card.property: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Iron Lad) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

alternate.name: Inexorable Fate
alternate.property: Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Iron Lad) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at the stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

card.name: The Realm of Rama-Tut
card.property: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Rama-Tut) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

alternate.name: The Realm of Rama-Tut
alternate.property: Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Rama-Tut) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

card.name: The Present Future War
card.property: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Scarlet Centurion) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

alternate.name: The Present Future War
alternate.property: Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Scarlet Centurion) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

card.name: Kang's Wrath
card.property: When Revealed: Reveal Kang (III) and add him to the game area. Reveal each face down Kang's Dominion under this stage.
You used your enemy's technology to reunite in the present day, just in time to counter Kang's assault on Earth.

alternate.name: Kang's Wrath
alternate.property: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for their nemesis minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Temporal Shield
card.property: Attach to Kang. Forced Interrupt: When Kang is attacked, discard Temporal Shield â†’ prevent all damage from this attack and deal 1 damage to the attacker. (Max 1 per attack.)
"Put away your childish weapons! They are no more than toys to me!" - Kang

card.name: Future Weapon
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks, the attack gains overkill. If this attack damages a hero, that hero is stunned. After this attack, discard Future Weapon. Attach to Kang.
"Like myself, you know that combat means something, and honor more~" - Kang

card.name: Frozen in Time
card.property: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would ready, discard this card instead. Attach to your identity.

card.name: Macrobots
card.property: Guard. Retaliate 1. Give Kang a tough status card.

card.name: Weakened
card.property: Forced Response: After you use a basic hero power, take 1 damage. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [physical] resource from your hand â†’ discard this obligation.
"History is made! Made by the deeds of the strong! The brave! And destiny is forged!" - Kang

card.name: Stolen Memories
card.property: When Revealed: Place the top 8 cards of your deck facedown under this card. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [mental] resource from your hand â†’ discard this obligation. (Discard each facedown card under this obligation.)

card.name: Depowered
card.property: You cannot play hero-specific cards. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a hero-specific card from your hand â†’ discard this obligation.
"Greater men than you have trembled at my name. Lesser men have fainted at its mention!" - Kang

card.name: Time-Travel Hijinks
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the highest-cost card you control, then place it facedown under this card. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [energy] resource from your hand â†’ discard this obligation.(Discard each facedown card under this obligation.)

card.name: Corrupted Timestream
card.property: Players cannot trigger "Alter-Ego Action" abilities on obligations. When Revealed: Each player must either discard 1 random card from hand, or place 2 threat here.

card.name: Kang's Dominion
card.property: Kang cannot take damage. When Defeated: Deal the player who defeated this scheme an encounter card.
"The future belongs to Kang! To Kang!" - Kang

card.name: Pinned Down
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 threat here for each obligation in play.

card.name: Rampage
card.property: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the player who defeated this scheme.

card.name: Energy Blast
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally or support you control. If you cannot, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Kang attacks you.

card.name: Manipulated Timestream
card.property: When Revealed: Discard each event from your hand. If no events are discarded this way, this card gains surge.
"It is the conquerors who change the world." - Kang

card.name: Time-Travel Tactics
card.property: Surge. When Revealed: Each player takes 1 indirect damage for each obligation in their play area. This card gains [boost] for each obligation in your play area.

card.name: Past Machinations
card.property: Incite 1. (Place 1 threat on the main scheme when this card is revealed.)When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different obligation and reveals it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: Ancient Warrior
card.property: Quickstrike. You are stunned.

card.name: Chitauri Soldier
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Chitauri Soldier attacks you, discard the top card of the encounter deck â†’ take indirect damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

card.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
card.property: Tyrannosaurus Rex's attacks gain piercing. Toughness.

card.name: Time Portal
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When this scheme is defeated, shuffle it into the encounter deck instead of discarding it.

card.name: Kang (The Conqueror)
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack. Toughness. When Defeated: Advance the main scheme to stage 2 at the end of the phase.

card.name: Kang (Immortus)
card.property: Toughness. This villain cannot take damage while a minion is in play. When Defeated: Remove The Chronopolis from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (Iron Lad)
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove Inexorable Fate from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (Rama-Tut)
card.property: This villain gets +1 ATK for each obligation in play. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove The Realm of Rama-Tut from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (Scarlet Centurion)
card.property: This villain's attacks gain piercing. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove The Present Future War from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

card.name: Kang (The Conqueror)
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack. Toughness. When Defeated: The players win the game.

card.name: Apocryphus
card.property: When Revealed: Discard an ally or support you control. Exhaust a character you control. Give this enemy another boost card.

card.name: Deathunt 9000
card.property: Toughness. Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) Give this enemy a tough status card and another boost card.

card.name: Sir Raston
card.property: Guard. Retaliate 1. Take 1 damage. Give this enemy another boost card.

card.name: Terminatrix
card.property: Terminatrix's attacks gain piercing. Quickstrike. Give this enemy 2 more boost cards.

card.name: Wildrun
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand. Discard 1 random card from your hand. Give this enemy another boost card.

card.name: The Anachronauts
card.property: When Defeated: Shuffle each [[Temporal]] card in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

card.name: Kang's Chosen
card.property: Incite 1. (When revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Temporal]] minion is discarded. Reveal that minion.

card.name: Kang (Master of Time)
card.property: Toughness. Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) Kang (Master of Time) gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each obligation in your play area.

card.name: Time-Displaced Soldier
card.property: Incite 1. Surge. Deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card.

card.name: Fear of Kang
card.property: You cannot attack Kang. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a random card from your hand â†’ discard this obligation.

card.name: Light of Centuries Sphere
card.property: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the player who defeated this scheme.

card.name: Ancient Grudge
card.property: When Revealed: Kang (Master of Time) activates against you. If Kang (Master of Time) is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Kang (Master of Time) and put him into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck.
